name: DANGDUT RUMBLE
description:
DANGDUT RUMBLE is a game about STEALING THE SPOTLIGHT with your giant SPEAKER while jamming to DANGDUT!

Play with up to 8 FRIENDS and try be the last standing on the stage!

Controls

WASD - Move
Spacebar - BLAST YOUR SPEAKER

Members - and their role

ARYA RAKHA - Developer

M YUSUF - Character Model

DIO ALS - Idea

This game is made for IGSI's 3rd Game Jam.
